channel.title: How to save GIFs in HIGH quality!
channel.description:
Hello, I would like to know if it is possible to save animated GIFs in a HIGH quality setting, like BMP/JPEG? Is it possible? Or do you need to save in the AVERAGE quality? I just made this sig: [img]http://img470.imageshack.us/img470/4816/fullmagixsig4mu.gif[/img]
And as you can see, the quality of the images is pretty bad! Is there a way to fix this?
[b]-I use "Adobe PhotoShop 9.0 CS2" -I animate with "Adobe Image Ready CS2"[/b]

item.title: How to save GIFs in HIGH quality!
item.dc:creator: @poor_noob poor noob
item.description:
@poor_noob wrote:

Look on the right and left ends. You will see it in the blue.

Read full topic
item.source: How to save GIFs in HIGH quality!

item.title: How to save GIFs in HIGH quality!
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

i think gif can only save up to 256 different colours, most which are probably taken up by the blues in that sig.

Read full topic
